text: Probably one of the best Korean BBQ restaurants in SG! Love the beef and the banchan. We ordered the 2 pax beef set and it was wonderful! The Ganjang Gejanh banchan was incredible!  Thoroughly enjoyed the food.
Yummy korean food, tasty meat, portion for the cold noodles is big! Also great service, they keep the side dishes topped up üòÅ

Our Valentine feast, moving away from our usual $1000 Omakase, we decided to venture into quality korean bbq, damage for this one is $300. Comparing to this to Hanjip, meat quality is comparable but this one has the seafood option, I prefer Hanjip cold noodles but Chang has a better Ginseng chicken soup. Chang has marinated crab which my wife love, beverage are better at Chang too. Good environment and service, without the time limit that Hanjip imposes. I guess Chang is now my goto for quality Kbbq.
Charcoal-grilled meat and authentic Korean side dishes ‚Äì a perfect escape from the bustling city of Singapore. A true healing spot with incredibly delicious food!

This Korean restaurant is a hidden gem! The dishes are absolutely fantastic, with authentic flavors and a wide variety!

The service is impeccable, with attentive and friendly staff who make you feel right at home. Highly recommend!
